topic.title: MdWiki
topic.body:
I tried to host [MdWiki](https://dynalon.github.io/mdwiki/#) @ ZeroNet but I suppose I'm doing something wrong. I just copied mdwiki.html from release to my site directory. (renamed it to index.html) I'v got `Forbidden Wrapper nonce error. Please reload the page.`
Here is [link](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1b9PAbphmZLEj2gMEUbS1Tz3GPfNET3HK)

topic.title: What do you think about RetroShare
topic.body:
Clearnet: http://retroshare.net/
I found this project few moths ago. I had no chance to test it properly yet. 
It's decentralized F2F communication and file exchange platform integrated with GPG. I'm interested what is your opinion about it.

3_15EnNiQcFsavvvm7WHt7SCjCv4vV6Gyu7z.body:
> [nofish](#comment_381_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): backup your data dir (data/user.json to be more specific) 
What about cert-rsa and key-rsa.pem? I suppose they should be included into backup

1_1HRgRrQ2AwD7qBQkDYrGr7w7Z15o52yiVJ.body: Nah, SSH to sdf.org feels like a hacker. This feels like a frigging future.

1_15zfQw1PPLNRYGUtuzTj1LN5hX6K24rUnY.body: I wonder if there is any other way to create decentralized dns stuff like namecoin but without enormous bulky blockchain :O

1_15NScazvsCHNmiXi6o6nvaMiwjeJYizgZQ.body: It would be crazy to not create Android client sooner or later I suppose :) I'll be waiting

2_1GCsW9TFfjDsvcdmKPADq1n8Q3ha72UtDQ.body: Golang. I'd love to learn Rust but I don't have time. And recently GdScript (scripting language in Godot Engine)

1_154jAWx5PDRmvF4txGHo4Edw1BpduhDyvw.body:
> [pyschopomp](#comment_2_1D7uESYtAKV36MVPGJZXuE7LUKbLwfo4dX): No offense, but "normals" is the reason the web sucks and is being pushed for stronger censorship.For those who have been around long enough all technologies begin like this. BBS, ant then Web 1.0.I think ZeroNet has a lot of potential but it's too early to start bridging with the regular joe. ZeroNet is for a censorship free internet, and allowing people with sensibilities in now could actually hinder that goal.

+10 :D

9_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL.body: Slack clone would be killer feature

1_1NK48tpcLLQzcbN6kCin4ZkMQosBd133PG.body: No witam rodaka :) Ciekawe ilu nas się tu znajdzie.

> [piotr](#comment_11_19nb7BmBbBv1gMVrzMyL3fTkd3HaoteYF8): Myślę, że ciężko by było ludzi namówić na zdecentralizowane social media bo:-na zcentralizowanych są ich znajomi-za pomocą zcentralizowanych mogą się logować w różne miejsca do jakieś gierek czy chuj wie co.

Ciężko mi namówić znajomych do używania Telegrama, co dopiero 0netu. Chociaż zdecentralizowany Slack mógłby zrobić furorę.
Jeśli chodzi o ten ZeroTalk to autor dodaje fora językowe. Wiki możemy założyć samemu.

7_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL.body: Only thing I'm missing are tags for threads or some kind of subcategories

1_1BQg5MQZ63aEQZMzLEXP6yY3hsgznKpaps.body:
Arch here :)

> [gabriel](#comment_1_1LLCfj6q47nJ2aXEVFSmy9Nv4dkKKJyUBQ): Basically, what ha said. You do realise that telling such things is bad opsec?
So far I'm using my clearnet identity here because I have no reason to hide. I know how to be stealthy, and I'll use my knowledge when necessarily but for now I don't care.

2. https://github.com/Nyr/openvpn-install

4. Profit.

1_1Da4ebREvCs4FX8pME6HGhuS8yqMHvPw8r.body:
You might try to use [MdWiki](https://dynalon.github.io/mdwiki/#!index.md) It's just html file with content in markdown, all client side.
My [test page](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1b9PAbphmZLEj2gMEUbS1Tz3GPfNET3HK) seems to work now :D

> [ks](#comment_37_14TDWFVHuTXNcg8pp6LRr7v9ZcfbFsMSyx): @teddyd
> 
> MdWiki seems to be a markdown viewer, not a wiki per se. Am I right? It's only possible to add pages by dropping .md files in its folder, and you can only edit the pages by editing the raw markdown loacally.

Yeah I suppose it could be used by small team of trusted people to deliver some content but not as public wiki. Sorry if I confused anyone.

10_17i7Y7r8nTaCfLbCAuaKyc4R5BbKZYU2Hr.body:
> [basxto](#comment_83_1PVcdu7USZH2kHMETbqDYLPjJZKCDWM52k): own server + own domain

It's good solution but not so simple to setup and maintain

1_1DBjD2Xf1DymmjxEi5K7aeoaRByAAXBvFW.body: Just don't up vote stuff you don't like/disagree.

1_1JgHfDK4eojCkVZHKey9hiMAcAc9mxMUK2.body:
My ideas:
- Q&A system
- Slack like chat
- git viewer (browse history and comments) and maybe later service similar to Github 
- anything based on IPFS (because  IPFS is awesome)
- encrypted password storage (similar to ZeroMail - you keep all the passwords but you can decrypt only your own) Not sure if this is good idea but oh well.
- GPG key server / site where people can upload PGP pubilc keys?
- real forum (ZeroTalk is more like reddit)
- games?

> [vivisect](#comment_2_1L6AzNZhaGYwQcDWNffD1najBfyvzeKhsG): 0net image host ? Or would that actually drown the network  ?

I'd love to see ZeroNet frontend for ipfs.pics :O

2_1J7dTw3ZsXUsXzpBqVWVj5aXRUMsMC6Nfc.body: Signal is better in terms of security but I don't care until they polish they mobile app because it sucks. Also It drives me crazy that I can't create Signal account without phone number :> For now I'll be using Telegram.

> [ryanleesipes](#comment_1_18GMgG7f7mYquJC1RCphMRLhMX1wsxzxff): Got so many people to use Telegram, and now I regret it as Wire and Tox would be better (more privacy-respecting) options.
> https://wire.comhttp://tox.chat

Wire still don't have open source server, right?

10_17VwZEfWSUWb5RHkK9m1odnDdBfvjTL6Cp.body: Fish - good defaults, fast, convenient. And It's not garbage when it comes to scripting. Let's be honest here: every POSIX contemptible shell have retarded syntax.
